1980 to 1990

Source: Population Estimates Branch, U.S. Bureau of the Census
Release date:  Aug. 1996

All data are consistent with the intercensal estimates shown in
Table 2 of CURRENT POPULATION REPORTS Series, P25-1106, issued 11/93
